author: rbb
msg: Remove ap_send_fb and ap_send_fb_length.  These functions don't make much
sense anymore, because the BUFFs that Apache used to use it for have all
been replaced with buckets.  BUFFs can't be used with filters, and Apache
doesn't use these functions anywhere anymore, so they need to go away now.

author: wrowe
msg: Potential Symbol Problem (actually, a reported problem, as soon as I
track down the report it will be closed).

author: rbb
msg: Update send_the_file to fall back to a read/write loop on platforms
without sendfile.  This also makes the apr_hdtr_t type available on
all platforms, regardless of whether apr_sendfile is defined or not.
Submitted by:	Brian Havard and Ryan Bloom

author: rbb
msg: Use autoconf to substitute the proper values into apachectl, and install
it when we install everything else.

author: rbb
msg: sysconfdir should use { and } instead of ( and ), because it is used in
